pages.text: $(li)The Iron Gate is a new kind of gate, like Fence Gates.$(br)$(li)The Iron Gate can be visually connected with Iron Bars, Sunmetal Bars, Entwine Bars and Gold Bars.
$(li)The Gold Gate is a new kind of gate, like Fence Gates.$(br)$(li)The Iron Gate can be visually connected with Iron Bars, Sunmetal Bars, Entwine Bars and Gold Bars.
